definition: a Turko-Mongol word used to describe a political entity ruled by a Khan or Khagan. Equivalent to tribal chiefdom, principality, kingdom or even empire
details:
noun
- a Turko-Mongol word used to describe a political entity ruled by a Khan or Khagan. Equivalent to tribal chiefdom, principality, kingdom or even empire
= example: a Turko-Mongol word used to describe a political entity ruled by a Khan or Khagan. Equivalent to tribal chiefdom, principality, kingdom or even empire
- the realm of a khan
